Visit type values

Codes representing possible values for the Visit type element

  • Include these codes as defined in http://who.int/cg/CodeSystem/extended-content
    CodeDisplay
    Returning ClientReturning client
    ReferralReferral
    New ClientNew client

    STI Follow upFollow up for STI management

    CodeDisplay
